SEARCH
Package control

Class StudentController

java.lang.Object
control.BaseController
control.StudentController
public class StudentController extends BaseController
Controller for student-facing operations.

Handles listing available internships, applying, accepting offers and requesting withdrawals.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    StudentController()
    Construct the controller and preload internships, applications and withdrawals from CSV.

  • Constructor Details

    • StudentController

      public StudentController()
      Construct the controller and preload internships, applications and withdrawals from CSV.

  • Method Details

    • getAvailableInternships

      public List<Internship> getAvailableInternships(Student student, List<String> levelFilters, List<String> companyFilters)
      Get internships available to the given student, taking into account visibility, approval status, deadlines, student's major/year, and optional filters.
      Parameters:
      student - student seeking internships
      levelFilters - optional level filters (nullable)
      companyFilters - optional company filters (nullable)
      Returns:
      list of internships matching eligibility and filters

    • hasAlreadyApplied

      public boolean hasAlreadyApplied(Student student, Internship internship)
      Check whether the student has already applied to the specified internship.
      Parameters:
      student - the student
      internship - the internship to check
      Returns:
      true if the student has an existing application for that internship

    • canApply

      public boolean canApply(Student student)
      Check whether the student is permitted to apply for additional internships. Rules enforced: cannot apply if an offer is already accepted; max active applications limit.
      Parameters:
      student - the student to check
      Returns:
      true if the student may submit another application

    • applyForInternship

      public boolean applyForInternship(Student student, Internship internship)
      Submit an application for the given student to the provided internship and persist it.
      Parameters:
      student - student applying
      internship - internship being applied to
      Returns:
      true when application added and CSV rewrite succeeded

    • getMyApplications

      public Map<Application,Internship> getMyApplications(Student student)
      Return a map of the student's applications mapped to their corresponding internships.
      Parameters:
      student - the student whose applications are requested
      Returns:
      map with Application keys and their Internship values

    • acceptOffer

      public boolean acceptOffer(Student student, Application appToAccept)
      Accept an offered application for the student: mark one application "Accepted", remove other pending/successful applications, remove pending withdrawals for the student, decrement internship slots and persist all modified CSVs.
      Parameters:
      student - the student accepting an offer
      appToAccept - the Application being accepted
      Returns:
      true when all persistence operations succeed

    • requestWithdrawal

      public boolean requestWithdrawal(Application appToWithdraw)
      Request a withdrawal for an existing application. The request is added with status "Pending".
      Parameters:
      appToWithdraw - the Application to withdraw
      Returns:
      true when the withdrawal request is saved

    • getPendingWithdrawalRequests

      public Set<String> getPendingWithdrawalRequests(Student student)
      Return a set of internship UUID strings for which this student has pending withdrawal requests.
      Parameters:
      student - the student to check
      Returns:
      set of internship UUID strings with pending withdrawals for the student

    • checkNotifications

      public List<String> checkNotifications(Student student)
      Produce student notifications (approved/rejected application or withdrawal outcomes). Side-effects: removes application/withdrawal entries that have been resolved and persists changes.
      Parameters:
      student - the student to check notifications for
      Returns:
      list of notification messages (may be empty)
